nodes.text: Evet Scy'rrep was a noted shipjacker who stole over fifteen large ships before getting caught. He was featured on Galactic Bandits. When asked why he only hijacked luxury liners, he merely replied: "Because that's where the credits are."
This character is a tuckerization of Steve Perry, the author who created the character in his book, Shadows of the Empire.
Pablo Hidalgo's take on the name
